name: The Bacteria Man
description:
How about being a bacterium man in the back rooms and killing all the people?

In this game you are the bacteria man and you have to kill the people falling in the back room.

This game was made for mağarajam5 in 3 days.

Human and human animations taken from https://www.mixamo.com/#/

bacteria man model taken from https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/backrooms-bacteria-rigged-3d-model-unofficial-6687b19f281b452f8d222d22ae3b1e9c

A game I developed alone.
